title: Mini-Ep 89: Protect Your Heart
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 89: Protect Your Heart
itunes:subtitle: It’s the first mini-episode of 2020! This week Kate and Doree hear from a teen listener trying to figure out balancing their many activities while still having a social life, discuss skincare needs for someone with both dry and oily skin, respond to a ...
description:
It’s the first mini-episode of 2020! This week Kate and Doree hear from a teen listener trying to figure out balancing their many activities while still having a social life, discuss skincare needs for someone with both dry and oily skin, respond to a listener struggling with the isolation that comes with care-giving, and offer up thoughts for someone at a crossroads in their longterm romantic relationship.


To leave a voicemail for a future mini-ep, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This episode is sponsored by:

  • Fabletics - Get 2 leggings for only $24 when you go to fabletics.com/forever35.
  • KIND - Visit kindsnacks.com/forever35 to create your own custom variety pack, and get 2 free KIND Minis® with your order when you use code FOREVER35 in your shopping cart.
  • ThirdLove - Get 15% off your first purchase when you go to thirdlove.com/forever.
  • Joybird - Head to joybird.com/forever35 for 25% off your first order with promo code FOREVER35.
  • Molekule - Use code FOREVER10 at checkout to get 10% off your first air purifier order at molekule.com.
  • Prose - Visit prose.com/forever35 for a free consultation and 20% off.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
